duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality patient care and clinical leadership in a hospital setting.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to ensure patient safety and well-being.
Utilize evidence-based practice and critical thinking to provide optimal patient outcomes.
Participate in research activities and continuing education to enhance clinical expertise.
Maintain a spirit of inquiry and promote a culture of safety in the healthcare environment.
Demonstrate strong communication skills and inter-professional collaboration in patient care.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an Accredited Nursing Program
BLS – Basic Life Support (required within 30 days of hire)
